cz.cvut.felk.cig.jcop.problem
Interface ConfigurationMap

All Known Implementing Classes:
IdentityConfigurationMap
public interface ConfigurationMap

ConfigurationMap is used if problem requires attributes attributes different type than Integer. Then configurations still uses Integers, but user output should be generated using mapping (for example Integer -> String).

Method Summary
 java.lang.Object map(java.lang.Integer value, int index)
          Maps one attributes value to another representation.
 

Method Detail

map

java.lang.Object map(java.lang.Integer value,
                     int index)
                     throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
Maps one attributes value to another representation.

Common representation is String or Integer.

Note that IdentityConfigurationMap is default mapping which just returns the same value as supplied

Parameters:
value - value of attributes attribute to be mapped
index - index of attributes attribute to be mapped
Returns:
mapped object
Throws:
java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index is out of bounds
See Also:
default implementation
